description: When is state incursion into personal privacy justified? This course will examine some of the ways in which the state has regulated our private lives, currently and in recent decades. Topics to be considered include the regulation of consensual sexual activity; the regulation of marriage; abortion prohibitions; and prohibitions on access to contraception.
name: INTIMACY, PRIVACY & SURV: Intimacy, Privacy & Surveillance

section.name: INTIMACY, PRIVACY & SURV: Intimacy, Privacy & Surveillance
